message: Let's start with a small difference, I'll give you a chance to accept!
Let's split it evenly, fair is fair!
You got a better offer last round, but I'm still willing to compromise!
Let's both get a decent amount, I'm willing to take a little more this time, but we'll get closer to even with the next offer.
You're getting a bit too greedy, Bob! Let's meet in the middle... again!
Okay, let's try to get a little closer. I'll give you a bit more, hopefully, we can agree on this one.
You're getting closer, but I'm not budging much more! Take it or leave it!
Alright, I'm willing to compromise a little more. Let's see if we can finally agree on this.
You're running out of time, Bob! Take it or leave it, but I'm not budging much more!
Okay, I'm getting desperate. I'll take what I can get, but we're running out of time. This is my final offer.
This is my final offer, Bob! Take it or leave it, we're running out of time!
